typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ex_id_str__c as string,
		Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourceSass
sourceSass derive(Name = iif(isInteger(substring(Name, 10,11)), substring(Name, 0,10) +substring(Name, 11), Name)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ex_id_str__c as string,
		Name as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:[''],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
